title: Bangladesh Private Sector Credit
description: Private Sector Credit in Bangladesh increased to 13413.20 BDT Billion in August from 13308.70 BDT Billion in July of 2022. Private Sector Credit in Bangladesh averaged 8105.74 BDT Billion from 1999 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 126840 BDT Billion in March of 2022 and a record low of 498.27 BDT Billion in June of 1999. This page provides the latest reported value for - Bangladesh Private Sector Credit - plus previous releases, historical high and low, short-term forecast and long-term prediction, economic calendar, survey consensus and news.
author: Bangladesh Bank
